name: ipatool.ts
description: A tool to download IPAs from the iOS App Store

build:bundle.command: esbuild src/cli/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.temp.js --platform=node --external:keytar --format=esm && node ./scripts/importify-esbuild-output.cjs ./dist/index.temp.js | esbuild --bundle --outdir=dist/ --platform=node --external:keytar --format=esm --minify --sourcemap && mv dist/stdin.js dist/index.js && mv dist/stdin.js.map dist/index.js.map && rm dist/index.temp.js

build:exe.command: caxa -i . -m "This may take a while to run the first time, please wait..." --exclude "*" ".*" "!dist" -o bin/ipatool.exe -p "npm install keytar && mv dist/index.js dist/index.mjs && mv dist/index.js.map dist/index.mjs.map" -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/dist/index.mjs"

author: beerpsi
